 TVL1Data ()

Detailed Description

Data class for standard (fast) 2-frames optical flow.

bool TVL1Data::setStructureTextureDecomposition ( CudaFlowLib::FilterMethod_t  filter,
const float &  weight,
const float &  smoothing 
) [virtual]

Generic set method for Structure-Texture Decomposition.

Parameters:
[in] filter Filter method that is used for str.-tex. decomp.
[in] weight Defines weighting between structure and texture component.
[in] smoothing amount of smoothing for str.-tex. decomposition.
Returns:
TRUE if state was changed. Means if activate switches the filters state.
